title: Blended Education Program for Medical Basic Skill Acquisition: Intramuscular Injection and Nasopharyngeal Swabbing

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical terminology comprehension and fundamental principles of infection control
context.additional_context: During the COVID-19 pandemic, there was a need to strengthen basic medical skills education in response to increased demand for healthcare workers. Designed low-cost education optimized for smartphone-based learning environments.

learning_goals: Apply appropriate site selection and injection techniques for intramuscular administration with 80% accuracy
Perform nasopharyngeal swab collection while adhering to aseptic technique with 90% compliance
Explain at least three standard precautions for patient safety during medical procedures

resources: Mobile Learning App (PDF Manual, Video Lectures)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
